login.A safe place to store your passwords: A safe place to store your passwords

folderShareDialog.Add people by typing their email: Add people by typing their email
folderShareDialog.Is not possible to share a folder with y: Is not possible to share a folder with your own user.
folderShareDialog.People with access to this folder: People with access to this folder
folderShareDialog.This folder has been already shared with: This folder has been already shared with this email.
folderShareDialog.This folder has not been shared with any: This folder has not been shared with anyone.

folderShareNotice.You will share this folder with: You will share this folder with
folderShareNotice.This person will be able to access this: This person will be able to access this folder, as well as view and modify contained passwords.
folderShareNotice.This person will not be able to delete t: This person will not be able to delete this folder or share it with additional people.

userSignup.We need to define a master password for: We need to define a master password for your user.
userSignup.This will be the only password you'll ha: This will be the only password you'll have to remember from now on, and it will maintain all your other passwords encrypted and secured.
userSignup.Please, choose a password and save it sa: Please, choose a password and save it safely. Note that if you forget it, Passager administrators won't be able to recover your account and you'll lose all your information.
userSignup.Tips for choosing a safe master password: Tips for choosing a safe master password:
userSignup.Use a password longer than 8 characters: Use a password longer than 8 characters.
userSignup.Use a password that contains at least on: Use a password that contains at least one capital letter, one number and one special character.
userSignup.Avoid using the same password on other s: Avoid using the same password on other services or accounts.
userSignup.Password must contain at least one small: Password must contain at least one small letter.
userSignup.Password must contain at least one speci: Password must contain at least one special character.
userSignup.Password must be at least 8 characters l: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
userSignup.Password must contain at least one capit: Password must contain at least one capital letter.
userSignup.Password must contain at least one numbe: Password must contain at least one number.

userMasterPasswordValidation.The entered password is not valid: The entered password is not valid.
userMasterPasswordValidation.We need your master password to decrypt: We need your master password to decrypt your passwords.
userMasterPasswordValidation.Your data can't be accessed without your: Your data can't be accessed without your master password, not even by Passager administrators.
userMasterPasswordValidation.If you lose your password, you won't be: If you lose your password, you won't be able to access your account. And nobody would be able to recover it.
userMasterPasswordValidation.We will never ask you for your master pa: We will never ask you for your master password by e-mail or other external methods. Do not share it with anyone, under any circumstances.

profile.Name: Name
profile.This feature is only available when pass: This feature is only available when passwords are stored locally
profile.When you store your passwords locally, t: When you store your passwords locally, they are saved in the local storage of your Internet browser.
profile.There are certain browser cleaning opera: There are certain browser cleaning operations that may delete this information, and may cause you to lose your passwords.
profile.It is therefore recommended to regularly: It is therefore recommended to regularly download backups via this page and store them on a secure storage device.
profile.In case you accidentally delete your dat: In case you accidentally delete your data, you can upload a backup copy by clicking on the "Import backup" button.
profile.In addition, you can upload your backups: In addition, you can upload your backups to other computers to have your passwords available on different devices.
profile.Error importing data. Submitted file is: Error importing data. Submitted file is not a valid backup.
